word:
We must push forward as fast as we possibly can with sanitarium work in southern California. I am sure that a sanitarium should be established near 


                                 -218- 

Los Angeles. This work has been delayed for want of proper management, and yet men have felt capable of managing. They have been unwilling to blend with others in the work. I hope that now we shall be able to make more advancement. But we shall be obliged to work on without the men who have not seen and improved their opportunities.
